message.raw:
Kill all our linking problems! STATIC! STATIC! STATIC!

Temporary workaround in Windows. The proper fix is probably get
rid of the STATIC keyword on gz_add_library and relay on the
cmake keyword to specify dynamic on *NIX and static on Windows.
